articles.summary: There are a number of health benefits associated with yoga, but can...
articles.author: Hira Naveed
articles.abstract: Daily migraines can be debilitating, but simple lifestyle changes like targeted exercises can provide relief. Fitness expert Derek Hough shares accessible movements that promote circulation, reduce tension, and help manage migraine symptoms naturally.

articles.summary: There are a number of health benefits associated with yoga, but can...
articles.author: Zoya Malik
articles.abstract: Emotional stress is a major trigger for migraines. In this article, Patsy Lynn, daughter of country legend Loretta Lynn, opens up about her migraine journey and shares practical strategies to manage stress and avoid painful flare-ups.

articles.abstract: Chronic stress is more than a mental health issue — it's a physical one too. Discover expert opinions on the direct correlation between stress and migraines, and explore preventative steps for long-term relief.

articles.abstract: Lifestyle changes like regular sleep, hydration, and screen-time control play a crucial role in migraine prevention. This article dives into effective habits that support long-term migraine management.

authors.name: Tamás Hám-Szabó
authors.bio: Bio of the author will go here. It can be up to 80 characters
authors.about: Hi there! My name is Muhammad Raheel, and I’m a passionate and experienced full stack developer. I specialize in creating dynamic, user-friendly web applications that meet the highest standards of functionality and design. With a strong foundation in JavaScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Postgresql and Graphql, I bring your ideas to life with robust and scalable solutions. Whether it's building sleek, responsive interfaces with custom CSS, Tailwind Css, Sass Css or developing complex server-side logic, I've got you covered. I'm proficient in TypeScript, which allows me to write clean and maintainable code. I also adhere to best practices and design principles like SOLID, ensuring that my code is both efficient and scalable. I’m well-versed in various design patterns including the atomic design pattern, domain-driven design, and dependency injection pattern. These patterns help me structure my code effectively and deliver high-quality applications. In today’s rapidly evolving tech landscape, understanding the nuances of microservices and monorepos is crucial. I have extensive experience in architecting and managing microservices, ensuring they work seamlessly together. Cloud services are an integral part of modern applications, and I have hands-on experience with AWS services such as AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, RDS, API Gateway, and EC2.  (200 Words)

accordian.question: Who is Sir Syed Kazim Ali?
accordian.answer: Sir Syed Kazim Ali is a renowned mentor and essay evaluator known for his expertise in preparing students for competitive exams like CSS, PMS, and descriptive writing.

accordian.question: For how long has he been teaching CSS, PMS, and Descriptive aspirants?
accordian.answer: He has been mentoring students for over 12 years with a strong track record of success in competitive examinations.

accordian.question: Where can I find his successful students’ essays?
accordian.answer: Successful student essays can be found in the 'Success Stories' section of the website or shared directly during live sessions.

accordian.question: Is there a free trial?
accordian.answer: Yes, a limited-time free trial is available for first-time users. It includes one essay evaluation with general feedback.

accordian.question: How does online essay evaluation work?
accordian.answer: You submit your essay through the platform, and within 48–72 hours, you'll receive detailed feedback, scores, and improvement suggestions.

accordian.question: If I don’t buy a subscription plan, can I get my essay evaluate?
accordian.answer: Without a subscription, you can still request a one-time evaluation by paying a small fee per essay.

accordian.question: How many essays can I evaluate daily?
accordian.answer: Depending on your plan, you can submit up to 1–3 essays per day for evaluation.

accordian.question: Do I get one on one evaluation of my essay?
accordian.answer: Yes, students on premium plans can receive personalized one-on-one feedback sessions from Sir Kazim.

accordian.question: Does Sir Kazim evaluate my essay by making an audio or video call?
accordian.answer: Audio or video calls are available for advanced feedback sessions in premium plans or upon special request.

accordian.question: What kind of feedback will I get after evaluation?
accordian.answer: You will receive detailed comments on structure, grammar, coherence, vocabulary usage, and suggestions to improve your score.
